description:
Enjoy your stay in our renovated apt, in one of Athens' most renowned neighborhoods, Thiseio, where the city's attractions and the public transport are within walking distance. It is a recently renovated, ground floor apt that is absolutely private, very comfy and with all the amenities that you might need for a perfect stay.

*** Check in starts from 14:00pm untill 22:00..late check in is available from 22:00 untill 24:00 with an extra fee of 15euros cash***
neighborhood_overview:
Situated on a pedestrian in Apostolou Pavlou Street, the apartment is just a stroll away from Athen's most vibrant historic sites, museums, food markets, shops, and restaurants. The Museum of Acropolis is steps away.
A stone’s throw from the Thiseio park and the city-center as well as from many museums and the Acropolis, the district is a great starting point to take in the city’s sights and sounds.
A locality that exudes warm, intimate vibes but one that has retained its historical edge.
Here is a neighborhood that has it all: century-old bakeries, pockets of green and all the major landmarks of the city in walkind distance.
The apartment is served by Thiseio train station, in 170 meters walking distance.

name: TrilogyCentral
description: Experience the heart of Athens. Welcome to a warm and modern nocarz, perfect for discovering the city. The apartment is located in the most central and one of its most historic streets, with easy access to its most important sights, such as the Acropolis, Syntagma Square, Plaka. The apartment is within walking distance of Metro stops,  ensuring easy access everywhere. In the area you will find restaurants, cafes, super-market, bakeries and designer shops.
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in one of   the safest areas in the center of Athens. Panepistimio street connects two of the historic squares of Athens, Syntagma Square with Omonia Square. Next to it are the most beautiful neoclassical buildings of the so-called Athenian Trilogy (Academy of Athens, for many the most beautiful neoclassical building in the world, the University and the National Library). At a short distance is the metro station "Panepistimio" and many bus stops that allow access directly and quickly everywhere in the city. From here begins the historic and commercial center of Athens, accessible on foot (Monastiraki, Thissio, Psyrri, Ermou, Acropolis) with dozens of cafes and restaurants. Within a few minutes are branded department stores, the most expensive street of the city (Bucharest) and the area of Kolonaki. Also within walking distance there are super-market, bakeries, etc. From here you can go anywhere, just walking, living literally the heart of Athens.

name: Right at the City Centre Psyri || Ederlezi Artemis
description: A modern & convenient suite, Ederlezi Artemis is the affordable luxury you owe to yourselves. All the amenities you have come to expect from Ederlezi Living with a view of the vibrant Psyri sq. Athens has never been more tempting a destination!
neighborhood_overview: Ederlezi Zoubourlou is located in Psyri, the artistic, vibrant & bohemian neighborhood in the heart of Athens, below the shadow of the Acropolis. It is reached easily by the central and iconic “Monastiraki” Metro station, through the “Athinas” exit. The area around it, the Historic Centre of Athens, is the literal heart of the city’s rich nightlife, while also being exceptionally close to all major landmarks of the Greek capital.
host_about:
I am Vasilis, but my friends call me Bill. I am an entrepreneur and escape room designer by profession and choice! I have studied Economics & Accounting in Greece. I have worked for years in Management and Human Resources in Greece’s most premium restaurant chain, constantly interacting with people and learning from them! During the last years I was part of the team that created Great Escape Rooms. Great Escape Rooms is one of the first and most successful Escape Room companies in Greece, based in Athens, but with branches in other cities in Greece and Cyprus. I love meeting new people and interacting with them!
My choice in movies and literature is classic, with murder mysteries and crime fiction being my absolute favourite! I also enjoy period pieces and my guilty pleasure is pirate movies and Greek classic films of past decades. I also love playing board games!

I have great knowledge of Athens, the places to visit, eat and drink. Athens is not just its famous ancient monuments, or the modern and stylish nightlife spots. It is the small, under-the-radar corners of a city that give it its flavour, and Athens has many of them.

name: The Magnolia - Sophisticated Residence
description:
This luminous and elegant penthouse belongs to art lovers and collectors.
The refined taste of its owners can be seen in its magnificent decoration. The furniture was purchased along the years in antique shops, some of them were customized, and others are original pieces by great designers and architects as Frank Lloyd Wright, Mies van der Rohe, Charles Eames and Vico Magistretti.
Paintings, drawings and little sculptures by major Greek artists emphasize the sophistication of this apartment.
neighborhood_overview:
The Magnolia - Sophisticated residence welcomes you in one of the oldest bourgeois neighborhoods of Athens with great urban aesthetics. Situated next to the largest public park in Athens, Pedion Areos and just 300m from the National Archaeological Museum, one of the greatest Museums of the world.
The neighborhood is really vibrant with many fashion stores, restaurants, coffee shops and bars.
The Magnolia - Sophisticated Residence is 2 minutes walk away from a metro station but all parts of the city center are also easily accessed on foot.
host_about:

name: Croc Apartment in Petralona
description: Enjoy the simple things in this peaceful and central accommodation. Renovated and stylish apartment, in one of the most beautiful areas of Athens. The apartment is fully equipped with everything you may need for a comfortable stay.
neighborhood_overview:
Southwest of the Acropolis, starting from the foot of Filopappou Hill and stretching west to Pireos Street, Petralona is a large residential neighborhood that is split down the middle by rail tracks, forming the picturesque Ano Petralona, which is closer to the Acropolis, and Kato Petralona (Upper Petralona and Lower Petralona, respectively).

Settled since ancient times, the area has had a long and winding history: it was abandoned and later re-inhabited, and renamed several times (at one point, Kato Petralona was known as Katsikadika – from the word “katsika,” which means goat – due to the large number of goat herders in the area). Later, a part of Ano Petralona came to be known as Assyrmatos or Attaliotika after 1922, when around 800 families of Greek refugees from Asia Minor settled here. Over time, some of their impoverished homes were replaced by a large, drab apartment block built for workers and, alternatively, at the behest of Queen Frederiki in the 1950s, beautiful

name: Modern Home w Balcony near Kolonak No Guest Fee
description:
Discover your 75m2 two-bedroom retreat, a plant-filled haven steps from Lykabettus Hill. Between upscale Kolonaki and vibrant Exarcheia, enjoy boutique shopping, hidden gems, and cultural delights.
- Perfectly located for exploring Kolonaki and Exarcheia.
- Art & music infusion for a vibrant atmosphere.
- 10-minute walk to the metro.
- Smart TV, new ACs, and a safe base for city exploration.
Ideal for
Couples seeking a stylish urban escape.
Friends and families exploring from a central location.
neighborhood_overview:
The building is located in Exarchia, bordering with Kolonaki, a neighborhood filled with high-end boutiques and restaurants. With such ideal location, you can be in Kolonaki for shopping within minutes, go up to Lykabettus Hill for a stretch in 5 minutes and walk around Exarchia to see artists/writers/bookstores any time.
We are passionate about this neighborhood and want to address the misperception that most people have before their first visit. Exarchia is one of the most colorful and vibrant neighbourhoods of Athens. Its alternative lifestyle made it one of the most welcoming and open-minded areas in Athens. The urban culture is being presented through multiple types of arts, while the most obvious and extremely impressive as mentioned above is the graffiti expression that decorate multiple of the area’s walls. Exarchia’s street art is actually known for promoting independence and respective values, such as freedom of expression, social awareness and the culture of resistance
host_about:
As ambassadors for Toronto, the vibrant cultural hub of Canada; Ho Chi Minh City, a rising star in Southeast Asia; and Athens, Greece, a magnificent historical treasure, Homes by IDG (I Do Good ) is dedicated to making your visit enjoyable. Our mission is to promote these cities, support sustainable tourism, and uplift local communities. Learn more about us on our website Homes by IDG.
We are looking forward to hosting you in one of our Homes

name: Stylish 2BR with Stunning Lycabettus Views
description: Welcome to our stunning apartment in the heart of Athens! Our modern 4th-floor apartment with 2 bedrooms is perfect for experiencing the city. Start your day with coffee on the balcony and end your evening relaxing after a day full of experiences. Our inviting bathroom is perfect for unwinding after an exciting day. Just a 5-minute walk from the Acropolis Museum and metro station, with quick access to the Acropolis, Plaka, and the Ancient Agora. Enjoy a comfortable stay with all amenities.
neighborhood_overview:
Acropolis - Temple of Zeus - Mets.

Leafy, quiet, cheerful, relaxed, homey and stylish, Mets is full of surprises, just minutes away on foot from the very centre of Athens. Snuggled between Ardittos and Logginou hills, Mets is a small, residential haven dotted with the homes of low-key artists, musicians, actors, journalists, architects, and residents that have been there for generations.

Here, everything central is nearby; the National Garden, Zappeion, Temple of Olympian Zeus, the Panathenaic Stadium and of course Acropolis!

A neighbourhood feeling of old-Athens style. Kain, a café-bar half-way down the road, is one of the area’s most popular local nightlife hotspots, where you’re bound to find people dancing late into the night.

neighborhood_overview: Mount Lycabettus (/ˌlaɪkəˈbɛtəs/), also known as Lycabettos, Lykabettos or Lykavittos (Greek: Λυκαβηττός, pronounced [likaviˈtos]), is a Cretaceous limestone hill in the Greek capital Athens. At 277 meters (908 feet) above sea The hill is a tourist destination and can be ascended by the Lycabettus Funicular, a funicular railway which climbs the hill from a lower terminus at Kolonaki (The railway station can be found at Aristippou street). At its two peaks are the 19th century Chapel of St. George, a theatre, and a restaurant. level, its summit is the highest point in Central Athens and pine trees cover its base. The name also refers to the residential neighbourhood immediately below the east of the hill. The hill is a tourist destination and can be ascended by the Lycabettus Funicular, a funicular railway which climbs the hill from a lower terminus at Kolonaki (The railway station can be found at Aristippou street). Nearby neighborhoods include Kolonaki, a chic and upscale area known for its high-end boutiques and trendy cafes, and Exarchia, a bohemian neighborhood with lively nightlife and a reputation for being the hub of the city's counterculture. Additionally, the historic Plaka neighborhood and the picturesque Anafiotika, nestled beneath the Acropolis, are just a short distance walking or with the two nearby Metro Stations, Megaro Mousikis & Evangelismos.

neighborhood_overview: As one of the world’s oldest cities, there's no surprise at the sheer amount of things to do in Athens – the destination is a master of reinvention. Athens has morphed into southern Europe’s capital of cool. Long weekenders are swooping in to check out the exciting food scene and check into the new wave of cool hotels in Athens. Artists and designers are settling in for good, lured by affordable rents, the promise of sunshine, and an anarchic spirit where you don’t have to play by the rules. There’s nothing orderly about Athens: traffic is chaotic, life is messy, the architecture a mash-up of Byzantine and Bauhaus, neoclassical and nondescript. The Parthenon still dominates the skyline – and will forever be one of the key things to do in Athens – but for most Athenians the antiquities embedded among tightly packed apartment blocks are an afterthought. Wikipedia
Kolonaki (Greek: Κολωνάκι, pronounced [koloˈnaci]), literally "Little Column" is a neighborhood in central Athens, Greece. It is located on the southern slopes of Lycabettus hill. Its name derives from the 2 metre column (located in Kolonaki Square) that defined the area even before a single house had been built there. (See map, with Colonne indicating the column.)

Kolonaki is a wealthy and upmarket district. As one of the capital's leading shopping areas, it includes a number of high-end boutiques from young adult to casual fashion to prestigious haute couture from Greek and international designers. One of its main shopping streets, Vo
host_about:
TopHouzzing’s story is simple yet exciting! We are Maria & Alex, the founders, both engineers. So we were already working together in the design & construction sector, so we  dealt with properties all the time. We are both into details, both love doing something right from scratch.

While we were traveling to new places and meeting old friends / making new ones, we felt what a rental should feel like, what it should offer guests like ourselves. Lots were missing, especially the simple little things that makes a visitor feel right at home -away from home. We then decided to start a rentals & real estate management company. It was July 2015 and we named it TopHouzzing Properties - the mission was simply to offer truly top accommodation to our guests. Starting then with a couple of our own properties, refurbished completely, we embarked on a great journey. 

Today the company manages close to 100 properties and growing steadily, mostly in Athens but also in mainland Greece and islands, flats, villas and so on. TopHouzzing  also offers consulting & real estate, design & construction and other professional services in its portfolio.

Hard work and our passion paid off. Our success is clearly stated not only in the many owners that trust us with their properties but even more in the hundreds 5-star reviews from guests from all over the world,  leading us to have a record of 14 consecutive quarters-since the company’s inception- SuperHost status on nocarz!

We take very good care of our guests and so do we with owners. You see, we both think as guests & owners ourselves. We are waiting anxiously to host you or to manage your property, in both cases you are in good hands with us.

description:
A modern hostel which offers a unique experience right at the heart of Athens.
Enjoy a comfy sleep in the dorms with curtains for privacy .
Have your breakfast at the lobby and relax at the rooftop with the view of the streets of Kerameikos, Acropolis and Technopolis.
Contemporary decor and historic elements combine on Kerameikos neighbour - just a block from the metro station of 'Kerameikos' and 15 minutes walking distance from Thiseio and Monastiraki.
neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood of the accommodation is very close to the Kerameikos metro station.
The square in Gazi is filled with cafes, restaurants, theaters , bars, and clubs.
Technopolis is just 2 minutes away as well as many venues where many festivals are held throughout the year.
A few meters away is the 'Archaeological site of Kerameikos' and the pedestrian street of Ermou that leads through a beautiful route to Thissio.
You can easily go to the Acropolis , the Acropolis museum, Monastiraki, Syntagma, Plaka, Herodion without having to use public transportation.

name: Elegant Apartment in Athens Center With Balcony
description: Within walking distance from all sights and attractions, this fully renovated three-bedroom apartment comes with a private balcony. It also sports a spacious living room with a lounge and a dining area, three luxurious bathrooms with cabin showers and a fully equipped kitchen. With all mod cons, reliable internet, a/c in all rooms and much more, this is your stylish home in Athens.
neighborhood_overview:
This is a wonderful part of downtown Athens that offers proximity to some of the most important landmarks of the world, as well as great options for dining or meeting with business partners and friends. The area is best explored on foot -everything you need, from bustling cafes and bars to quaint tavernas, modern eateries and chic shopping, is just around the corner. Plus, bus and metro connections are excellent, when you want to venture beyond the limits of the city center – every corner of which, is literally accessible by foot.

The building is located on a residential street but very close to one central avenue of Athens. The location is perfect if you wish to use public transport, the nearest bus stop is at only 160 meters (less than a 3-minute walk) and the nearest metro station is at 650 meters. Syntagma Square is within less than a 20 minutes’ walk, and Kallimarmaron Stadium at 10 minutes by foot. All sights are just a short walk away!
host_about:
Welcome to MyGreekVacations! We're thrilled to have you join us in one of our unique, beautifully-designed apartments here in Athens. As passionate travelers ourselves, we know that the perfect nocarz rental is more than just a place to stay – it's an experience that you'll remember for a lifetime. 
Whether you're here for business or leisure, we're always available to provide assistance to make your stay as comfortable and enjoyable as possible.

name: Sunny Luxury Loft,Stunning Acropolis View, Jacuzzi
description: This luxurious loft is located in the heart of the city Centre, making it the best starting point for a day full of sightseeing and entertainment. Located next to the best bars and restaurants that this city has to offer. It is just a few steps away from Monastiraki metro station that connects you straight to the Airport, 5 mins walk to Syntagma square. It's located on the 4th floor of our building, fully renovated and offering Acropolis view straight from your dining table!
neighborhood_overview:
You will be staying in the heart of the city center, with all top sightseeings and local markets at a walking distance, as our apartment is at the historical Center.

-There is a large supermarket at a 1 min distance from the house on the same street (50 meters away)

-The location is one of the safest in Athens.
-The access from the Airport is super easy.
You can take the metro and we are literally outside of the metro station

-All metro lines are very close:
Syntagma station has both red and blue line, and it is around 800m away on foot or you can take the metro from Monastiraki, which has green and blue line.

-The neighbourhood is very vibrant and it is considered by locals the essence of what this city really is about

-There are many places to eat around the house, some of which are the most traditional hidden old Athenian taverns, as well as many amazing bars where locals visit.

name: Green Suite - K23 Color Suites
description: The K23 Green Suite is an ideal choice for travelers seeking a memorable stay in Athens. With its unique design, featuring a blend of neutral colors, the suite exudes a sense of relaxation. Measuring 26 m², the Suite offers all the necessary amenities for a high-quality stay, including a queen-size bed, a spacious living room with a sofa, a fully equipped kitchen, air conditioning, and a smart TV. Guests can also enjoy a private terrace, measuring 12 m², and enjoy stunning views of the city.
neighborhood_overview:
Located in the heart of Athens, K23 Color Suites offers guests a convenient and stylish place to stay while exploring the city. The complex is located just 5 minutes from the Omonoia metro station, making it easy to get around and see the sights. Its central location also puts it within easy reach of many cultural attractions, including the Acropolis, the National Archaeological Museum, the Ancient Roman marketplace, and the historic neighborhood of Plaka.
In addition to its cultural offerings, the location of K23 Color Suites is also ideal for business travelers, with the Athens International Airport and Piraeus Port just 35 km away. And for those looking to experience the nightlife of Athens, the complex is surrounded by a variety of restaurants, cafes, bars, and nightclubs. Whether you're traveling for leisure or business, K23 Color Suites is the perfect choice for a memorable stay in Athens.

neighborhood_overview:
Exarcheia neighborhood in Athens is nestled between the foot of the beautiful Lycabettus Hill and Pedion tou Areos, one of the largest parks in Athens. It borders with the classy neighborhood of Kolonaki and Omonia square on the south and it’s only a few minutes away from Syntagma and the Academy of Athens.

Exarcheia has an edgy alternative vibe ,its streets decorated with politically charged murals and lined with bookshops. Bars and Clubs host live music , including jazz and punk acts.

name: When in Athens - Long term rental
description:
This long-term rental of 91 square meters is a bright, renovated and beautifully decorated apartment with vintage furniture. It is ideal for someone who visits Athens for work or works from home.
Convenient location, very close to all public means of transportation, museums, parks, cinemas, theaters, shops and restaurants.
neighborhood_overview: Kypseli is a neighborhood in central Athens and it is the perfect choice for travelers seeking of  “couleur locale” during their visit. It can be briefly described as an authentic Athenian neighborhood. One can find galleries, theaters, cinemas, bars, restaurants, traditional taverns, local or ethnic markets. For architecture lovers and artists, it is the place to be! Its development started at the 1910s and was inhabited by middle to upper-class families. This is why beautiful buildings and apartments of Neoclassical, modernist, Bauhaus and Art deco style are everywhere in Kypseli. Nowadays, it is home to artists, filmmakers, actors, writers, poets, musicians, immigrants and students. It is very popular among nocarz guests too.

name: Thalia by Heloni Apartments
description:
Welcome to our apartment Thalia for 9 guests, nestled near the iconic Odeon of Herodes Atticus, in Athens. This spacious apartment features three comfortable bedrooms and three bathrooms, each thoughtfully designed to provide a peaceful haven for relaxation.
You can ascend to the shared rooftop terrace, where an awe-inspiring view of the Acropolis awaits.
Apartment Thalia has a private entrance. To go to the rooftop, you must go to a different entrance in the same building on the street below.
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in the most ideal location of Athens as in just a few minutes you can find yourself in the archaeological site of the Acropolis and the Museum. You can walk or have a drink on Dionysiou Areopagitou Street, which is a pedestrian street, next to the southern slope of the Acropolis. You can also enjoy a beautiful walk on the hill of Filoppapos, which is very close by and takes its name from the monument on top of it.
host_about:
Heloni is an ancient Greek word that translates into tortoise. This philosophy focuses on the sense of security and comfort that the turtle feels within its shell. 
Through the idea of the "Virtual hotel," we provide apartments that, although distant from a traditional reception, manage to ensure a comfortable stay. This approach allows guests to enjoy their desired privacy, creating an environment that enhances their travel experience.

Kerameikos was named in 2018 by Forbes one of the world’s coolest neighborhoods. It’s an exciting part of the city with endless choices of bars and restaurants, and it’s a place where you can feel the vibrancy of new Athens unite with the grandeur of the old.
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located 1 minute away from the leafy Avdi square which is considered the heart of the unique neighborhood of Kerameikos. Within steps away you will be among a plethora of hip cafes, bars and restaurants. The apartment is located within walking distance (10-20 minutes) to all the Main Archaeological Sites of Kerameikos, Monastiraki, Thissio, Plaka, Acropolis & Psirri. Kerameikos was named in 2018 by Forbes one of the world’s coolest neighborhoods. It’s an exciting part of the city with endless choices of bars and restaurants, and it’s a place where you can feel the vibrancy of new Athens unite with the grandeur of the old. It was one of the largest districts of ancient Athens located on the northwestern edge of the city. As its name suggests, it was a settlement area for potters and vase painters and the main place of production of the famous Attic vases. Kolonaki is the most upmarket region of Athens, popular for its chic residents, neat restaurants, a big variety of cafes, and a wide number of fashion designer shops. It is considered the diamond of Athens because of its aristocratic structure in combination with its great architectural interest that makes it a source of culture and quality entertainment. neighborhood_overview: Gkazi was the first industrial zone of Athens. As the city expanded, factories moved further to the suburbs, but the buildings remained. Technopolis, the Benaki Museum, Pavlidis chocolate factory and the old OSE Depot, are all industrial buildings that were repurposed and offer a rich program of cultural shows, events and exhibitions. The area is ever changing, but steadily offers plenty of entertainment options, from clubs to polished restaurants and always emits a strong urban vibe.

Theo

neighborhood_overview:
Such alluring spontaneity is especially felt in Koukaki , the verdant, pedestrian-friendly adjoining neighbourhood just below the Acropolis. Despite the presence of this visitor-clogged landmark that surreally pops out in the midst of an urban landscape and several museums, they remain remarkably hushed, inviting wandering and lingering” this is what Vogue wrote recently about Koukaki area. And it truly is a new, hip and friendly neighbourhood at the footprints of Acropolis with a classic character, remarkable neo classic buildings and tiny shops full of surprises in affordable prices. Find a hip café right next door, café and tavern with home made food just some steps away, a super market just a minute walk away and excellent links to public transport such as buses, trolleys and metro.

The Metro station of Fix and Acropolis are just 15 minutes walk away. Don’t forget to walk to Filopapou Hill that is just 100m away from the doorstep and enjoy the amazing view to Acropolis,

name: Brand new apartment in the center/ Kolonaki
description: Our flat is located in one of the most beautiful areas of central Athens, Kolonaki. A wealthy, upmarket and safe neighborhood, that is quiet and with lots of green spaces. The flat is very close to nightlife, a variety of amazing restaurants, the city center, parks, and public transport. It features space for up to 4 persons and a balcony with a view to a leafy pedestrian way. It is ideal for couples, solo adventurers and business travelers.
neighborhood_overview:
Kolonaki is one of the most beautiful neighborhoods of central Athens. A wealthy, upmarket and safe neighborhood, that is quiet and with relatively lots of green spaces. Outdoor seating for cafes and eateries is typical, creating a lively atmosphere day and night.
As one of the capital's leading shopping areas, it is also a fashionable meeting point and includes a variety of designer shops. One of its main shopping streets, Voukourestiou Street, is now known for its extensive jewelry collection. The Athens Concert Hall, a modern building which superb acoustics and facilities, the center of cultural musical life in Athens, is also located in the neighborhood. Museums and galleries also abound in the area with The Benaki Museum - inside a preserved neoclassical manor house - and the Goulandris Museum of Cycladic Art, as two of its finest examples. A walk across the street from Vasilissis Sofias Avenue will lead you to the Byzantine Museum, and the War Museum.
host_about: Hey guys, im Nikos and live between Athens and Nicosia. Having properties in both cities has given me the opportunity to be a telecoms enginner during  the week and a party loving Athenian at the weekends :) I love simple modern design and this, i believe, reflects in my properties.

Examples: A) Monastiraki and Syntagma area are the most beautiful and representative places in Athens, with most sightseeings accumulated around and literally hundreds of nice restaurants, bars, clubs, live music halls etc
B) Around Metro Station "Kerameikos" of Line 3 (5 min walk) are also numerous bars and restaurants. This is a more "artistic" area of Athens but can match all expectations.
Just drop me a message and tell me the purpose of your visit (work, sightseeing, fan, etc) and we can make excellent suggestions.

name: Ourania by Heloni Apartments
description:
Apartment Ourania is located literally a breath away from Acropolis and the Odeon of Herodes Atticus. Next to Dionisiou Aeropagitou Street, a pedestrianized street to the slope of Acropolis where famous artists used to stay for their performances at the Odeon. Near is the entrance to the ancient Theatre of Dionysus and Philopappos Hill.
For those seeking a touch of serenity and a breathtaking panoramic view of the Acropolis, the shared rooftop terrace awaits.
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in the most ideal location of Athens as in just a few minutes you can find yourself in the archaeological site of the Acropolis and the Museum. You can walk or have a drink on Dionysiou Areopagitou Street, which is a pedestrian street, next to the southern slope of the Acropolis. You can also enjoy a beautiful walk on the hill of Filoppapos, which is very close by and takes its name from the monument on top of it.
host_about:
Heloni is an ancient Greek word that translates into tortoise. This philosophy focuses on the sense of security and comfort that the turtle feels within its shell. 
Through the idea of the "Virtual hotel," we provide apartments that, although distant from a traditional reception, manage to ensure a comfortable stay. This approach allows guests to enjoy their desired privacy, creating an environment that enhances their travel experience.

name: Bright & Restful!
description: Welcome to this bright and contemporary living space in the heart of the city. Start your day with the warm Greek sun and make yourself at home in this comfortable refuge. You'll find everything you need here, including a memory foam king-size bed for a restful sleep, a 55'' Smart 4K TV and Wifi for your entertainment, and a well-equipped kitchen with tableware and a washing machine. Come and enjoy a hassle-free stay in Athens with all the modern comforts you could want.
neighborhood_overview:
Welcome to a truly authentic Athens experience in a downtown neighborhood with strong multicultural elements. Living here will give you a glimpse into the real Athenian lifestyle.

The apartment is located on the historical "Peiraios Street", which connects the city center to the Port of Piraeus. This tree-lined avenue runs over parts of the north wall and ancient road of Phaleron, offering a unique blend of history and modernity.

All your essential needs are easily accessible, as you can find all kinds of shops, supermarkets, groceries, bakeries, pharmacies, and banks within a short 10-minute walk.

Come and immerse yourself in the rich history and culture of Athens by staying in this vibrant and bustling neighborhood.
host_about: Hi travelers! I'm Nasos, the proud owner of WelcomeHost, a company dedicated to delivering exceptional short-term rental experiences. description:
Unique, fully equipped, brand new 2-storey maisonette in the heart of Pagrati, 2minutes from the Park of Pagrati, a breath from the center of Athens and just 5minutes away from the metro station of Evangelismos, is a guaranteed choice forfamilies or even couples. neighborhood_overview:
Pagrati is a district of the eastern part of the Municipality of Athens, which extends east of Vasilissis Sofias Avenue, a short distance from the historic centre of Athens. The main attraction of the Pangrati area is the Panathinaiko Stadium. The National Gallery, the Goulandris Foundation Museum of Contemporary Art and the National Research Foundation are located in the wider area of the district, while the Athens Conservatory, the Byzantine Museum, the Officer's Club and the War Museum are a
short distance away.

Pangrati was developed with its centre at the Eftihidou Street, where its residents and other Athenians used to hang out, and Ymittou Street, where mainly residents of the surrounding refugee districts of Byron and Kaisariani used to hang out. Pagrati thus became the centre of the south-eastern areas of Athens, which met the needs of the residents of the surrounding areas for shopping, entertainment and services. An important commercial centre of Pagrati to t

name: Acropolis view Athenian Yellow apartment @Syntagma
description: The Yellow Athenian apartment is the place to stay if you want to visit Athens and live like an Athenian! neighborhood_overview:
From TripAdvisor ©
Perhaps the best place to get your bearings is
Syntagma Square, crowned by the imposing Parliament
building on its upper side and surrounded by other
large structures, such as the exclusive Hotel Grande
Bretagne. The grand avenues that lead towards Omonia
are also full of massive Neoclassical edifices like
the Numismatic Museum and those around smaller Platia
Kolokotroni. Here you will find lots of travel agents,
bookshops and fashion shops, especially on Ermou
Street. Just south of Syntagma Square, you can take a
breather in the lush National Gardens, which extend
into the grounds of the Zappeio palace and beyond to
the ancient Temple of Olympian Zeus.

neighborhood_overview:
There is a plethora of available options for nightlife, including bars, ouzeries, and tavernas. Outdoor seating on pedestrian walks is typical, creating a lively atmosphere at night. Exarcheia is bordered on the east by Kolonaki and is framed by Patission Street, Panepistimiou Street and Alexandras Avenue. Exarcheia is renowned for being Athens’ historical core of radical political and intellectual activism.

The National Archaeological Museum of Athens, the National Technical University of Athens and Strefi Hill are all located in Exarcheia. The central square features many cafés and bars with numerous retail computer shops located mainly on Stournari street, also called the Greek Silicon Valley. Located on Exarcheia square is one of the oldest summer cinemas of Athens, called “Vox”, as well as the Antonopoulos apartment building, known as the “Blue Building”, because of its original colour, which is a typical example of modern architecture in Athens during the inter-war per

Our apartment is located in Pedion Areos, one of the best neighborhoods in downtown Athens, attached to Athens' biggest park. It's a real source of clean air and a paradise in the center of hectic Athens.

Relax in this beautiful,60m2, ground floor 2bdr apartment. Bright yet calm, with a decoration that creates a cozy atmosphere. Fully renovated and equipped, it can accommodate up to 6 guests, since it provides 2 bedrooms and a sofa that converts into a double bed in the living room.

The flat is within a 10-min walking distance from Syntagma Square and its metro station, the most convenient subway station downtown!
Just 1min from the Ancient Stadium and the National Garden!
neighborhood_overview:
Mets, Pagrati border line, is a neighborhood of Athens, Greece. It is located between Ardettos Hill, First Cemetery of Athens and Temple of Olympian Zeus.
We love the area our flat is at! It's so quiet, with pedestrian walkways, the huge Stadium piazza, close to everything. It gives you such a nice feeling to just be there. There are many things to do in Pagrati area as well as in Mets area, its heart being right up the steps from our flat, at Archimidous street and Varnava Square. We are confident you will absolutely love it!
host_about:
TopHouzzing’s story is simple yet exciting! We are Maria & Alex, the founders, both engineers. So we were already working together in the design & construction sector, so we  dealt with properties all the time. We are both into details, both love doing something right from scratch.

While we were traveling to new places and meeting old friends / making new ones, we felt what a rental should feel like, what it should offer guests like ourselves. Lots were missing, especially the simple little things that makes a visitor feel right at home -away from home. We then decided to start a rentals & real estate management company. It was July 2015 and we named it TopHouzzing Properties - the mission was simply to offer truly top accommodation to our guests. Starting then with a couple of our own properties, refurbished completely, we embarked on a great journey. 

Today the company manages close to 100 properties and growing steadily, mostly in Athens but also in mainland Greece and islands, flats, villas and so on. TopHouzzing  also offers consulting & real estate, design & construction and other professional services in its portfolio.

Hard work and our passion paid off. Our success is clearly stated not only in the many owners that trust us with their properties but even more in the hundreds 5-star reviews from guests from all over the world,  leading us to have a record of 14 consecutive quarters-since the company’s inception- SuperHost status on nocarz!

We take very good care of our guests and so do we with owners. You see, we both think as guests & owners ourselves. We are waiting anxiously to host you or to manage your property, in both cases you are in good hands with us.

name: Spacious Apartment with Stunning Acropolis Views
description:
Welcome to our newly renovated, spacious apartment—ideal for groups of friends, families, and couples seeking a cozy, comfortable retreat in a prime location.

Just a short walk from Athens' vibrant commercial center, our apartment boasts stunning Acropolis views, free Wi-Fi, two bathrooms, a washing machine, and air conditioning. Whether you're here for a weekend getaway or an extended stay, you'll find it the perfect base for exploring the city’s treasures.
neighborhood_overview:
Welcome to one of Athens' oldest and most historical neighborhoods. Once overlooked in the 90s, this area has seen a resurgence, becoming a lively hub filled with trendy restaurants and coffee shops. With Greece's almost year-round great weather, it's the perfect spot to enjoy the city.

Prime Location Highlights:

- The Acropolis and Ancient Market: Just 1800m and 950m away. Nearby, explore Monastiraki, a bustling folk bazaar perfect for shopping and coffee.

- Gazi: Only 950m west, this modern, alternative neighborhood boasts numerous coffee shops, bars, and restaurants.

- Athenian Commercial Center: About 1000m in the opposite direction, ideal for shopping, barhopping, and exploring.

- Local Delights: Even within the neighborhood, you'll find plenty of dining and entertainment options to suit all tastes.

Upon reservation, we'll email you a local guide packed with tips and suggestions to help you make the most of your sta
host_about:
Passionate about the hospitality industry in all its forms. Sociable, always open to new challenges, I enjoy making new acquaintances and like my guests to have a great time!

I have a passion for traveling, exploring new places, living new experiences and then share it with our guests. My goal is to provide the best possible accommodation experience and to give our guests a taste of the Greek way of living.

I really like to give our guests the opportunity to enjoy complete privacy, like living at home. However, I consider myself a "local connoisseur", and I enjoy sharing my secrets! Before your arrival and throughout your stay, I will be more than happy to assist you in any way: Proposals for tours, sightseeing, shopping, dining and drinks. 

Moreover, I can help you organize excursions to nearby destinations and provide you with information about events that take place in the city during your stay.

The property is in walking distance from all major attractions and downtown trendy areas and only 10 minutes walk from Acropolis, Parthenon, Ancient Agora, Plaka, Keramikos and Gazi area.

name: Cottage family house downtown
description:
Our house is part of "Petrina" (a complex of houses made of stone in the 50's to house refugee families from Turkey). It has been fully renovated with love and care.
Relax at this peaceful place next to Philoppapou Hill. Watch the sunset and the amazing view from the terrace.
Walk to Acropolis, Thisio and Monastiraki, or discover "Petrina" the most special area of Athens that is so central and yet feels like a village with lemon trees and blooming gardens.
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is Ano Petralona and specifically "Petrina". Petrina is a small village with houses made of stone in the heart of the city! Philopappou hill is 3 min walk and Acropolis 15 min walk. The place of the house is ideal for people who want to relax and like nature yet at the same time want to be close to all the important sites of Athens!
host_about:
Hi! We are Natassa and Manos. We are film directors and screenwriters, actually we first met at a film set.

We have a 6 years old son, Marios, whom we adore and love spending time with him.
 
We speak English, Greek, Italian and Spanish. We love traveling and always like to be hosted by friends where you get to feel the life of the place.
 
That's why we find nocarz a great idea!
I hope you enjoy yourselves in Athens!

name: Abstract Flat With Urban View
description:
Welcome to your bright, stylish, and newly renovated Athens city center flat on the iconic Peiraios Street.

With all the modern amenities you need for a comfortable stay, including WiFi, a 50'' Smart 4K TV with Netflix, a washing machine, and a well-equipped kitchen with tableware, this contemporary living space has everything to make you feel at home.

Relax on the king-size bed after a long day of exploring the city.
neighborhood_overview:
Immerse yourself in the lively spirit of Athens by staying in this charming apartment located in a typical downtown neighborhood with a strong multicultural ambiance.

Situated on the historical Peiraios Street, one of Athens' main roads, this property boasts a prime location connecting the city center to the bustling Port of Piraeus.

Convenience is at your doorstep, as all points for essentials, from shops and supermarkets to groceries, bakeries, pharmacies, and banks, are within a leisurely 10-minute stroll.

Experience Athens like a local by choosing this apartment as your base, where you can soak in the vibrant culture and history of the city with ease.

name: UrbanStyle apt with 360 view
description:
Enjoy the simple things in this peaceful and central accommodation.
It is located a 7-minute walk from the Attiki and Sepolia metro stations. Omonia is 9', Monastiraki 13', Syntagma 14', Acropolis 24' from the metro station .

Enjoy the simple things in this serene and central place to stay.
Located 6’-7’ walk from Attiki and Sepolia metro stops.
neighborhood_overview:
The accommodation is located in the Skouse Hill area and is 1.4 km from the Plato Academy archaeological site. The neighborhood is quiet and safe. Parking on the street where the apartment is located is very easy and safe. Very close there are supermarkets, bakery, banks, pharmacies, hairdressers, taverns and cafes. At 400 meters from the accommodation, 5' on foot you will find Skuzhe hill with the small grove, the church of Agios Emilianos and an excellent mezedo shop with a view of the Acropolis. Attica metro station and Sepolia station are 7 minutes' walk from the apartment. Omonia is 9' from Attica metro station, Monastiraki 13', Syntagma 14', Acropolis 24'. In addition, the Athens Peloponnese train station is a 14' (1.2 km) walk from the UrbanStyle apartment.
The property is located in the Skouze Hill area and is 1.4 km from the archaeological site of Platonos Academy. The neighborhood is quite and safe. The street parking where the apartment is located is very easy and safe.

name: Modern Studio Apartment
description:
The apartment is situated in Kolonaki at the heart of Athens. Newly renovated, fully equipped, and located in a lovely and quiet neighborhood. The nearest metro station that connects directly to the airport is Evangelismos and is just 450m walking distance.

It is situated on the second floor of the building, but because the area is uphill, we have made our own private entrance from the side street above. Therefore, no elevator is needed, with direct access to the apartment floor.
neighborhood_overview: Although Kolonaki is regarded as the most glamorous and quite areas in Athens, is located in walking distance from most attractions, museums, shops and places to be explored. The main attraction would be ofcourse the Lycabettus, cable car. Is just 2 minutes away, and the view is just breathtaking. About 50 meters away is Patriarchou Ioakeim street, a beautiful road full of shops and bars that takes you to Kolonaki Square. From there National Garden, Monastiraki, Ermou Street, and even Acropolis is few minutes by foot. We always recommend to walk, and explore Athens center by foot. And don't forget, Kolonaki is probably one of the safest areas in Athens. No matter what time you want to go out, even late night or early morning is as safe as mid day.
host_about: Full time music producer, part time nocarz host.

The neighborhood is very friendly, tranquil and secure, with many shops, cafe and restaurants.
neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood
KK Athens Fine Stay is a perfect choice when you visit Athens because it offers you a stylish and comfortable accommodation, very close to the historical center of Athens, right opposite a central Metro Station, in a very safe and peaceful part of the City of Athens, surmounted by many places of interest. The neighborhood is very friendly, tranquil and secure, with many shops (including 24 hours convenience stores), cafe and restaurants. At 3 min walk there is a beautiful hill with easy access to its top from where one can admire a panoramic city view, from the sea and the Piraeus Port, to Acropolis and the Lycabetus Hill.
The building is a typical Athenian building, with friendly and helpful inhabitants. The apartment is on the 2nd floor and there is an elevator.

name: Adorable 2BD Apartment near Kallimarmaro Stadium
description:
Step out of your apartment and into one of the most historic neighbourhoods, Mets . Take a break to enjoy the lovely weather with a cold coffee or refuel at one of the many distinguished restaurants and exquisite street venders. With an apartment at the heart of Athens, all you have to do to have a once in a lifetime experience, is make sure not to miss a beat.
Nearest Metro Station ''Acropolis''- around 10 min walk. Internet up to 24Mbps.
neighborhood_overview: The neighbourhood of Mets is a perfect location right next to the centre of Athens, strictly speaking, a small section of the central suburb of Pangrati, but it has a charm that is all its own. Though it’s less than a 10 minute walk to Syntagma Square and to the Acropolis, strolling its backstreets or through the park you’ll feel like you’re a world away from a bustling European capital, with all the associated cultural offerings. Don’t forget to check out the hill of Arditou, next to Kallimarmaro stadium, as well as the National Garden of Athens and Zappeion, a gorgeous architectural gem of Athens just 2 minutes walk away.
host_about:
Hi! We are UPSTREET and we would like to welcome you to your new home away from home!

Combining our genuine love for Athens with our professional knowledge, we aim to offer you the best time during your accommodation.

Even if you are traveling for a few days or for a while, our freshly renovated apartments are in central and vibrant locations, ready to provide you with the most reliable services and amenities.

Your experience is not based on luck or the choices of each owner anymore. Live only the surprises you signed up for and get to know the city like a local.

The best things might be waiting for you upstreet. Get ready and just enjoy the ride!

host_about:

name: Unique Acropolis View HiEnd 2bdr TopAthens location
description:
At the best location in Acropolis area, with the BEST VIEW of Acropolis you can get, from the living room and bedroom...! Incredible during the day, simply stunning at dawn and night!

This flat is just exceptionally well made, the design and finishes, materials and furnishings!

host_about:
TopHouzzing’s story is simple yet exciting! We are Maria & Alex, the founders, both engineers. So we were already working together in the design & construction sector, so we  dealt with properties all the time. We are both into details, both love doing something right from scratch.

While we were traveling to new places and meeting old friends / making new ones, we felt what a rental should feel like, what it should offer guests like ourselves. Lots were missing, especially the simple little things that makes a visitor feel right at home -away from home. We then decided to start a rentals & real estate management company. It was July 2015 and we named it TopHouzzing Properties - the mission was simply to offer truly top accommodation to our guests. Starting then with a couple of our own properties, refurbished completely, we embarked on a great journey. 

Today the company manages close to 100 properties and growing steadily, mostly in Athens but also in mainland Greece and islands, flats, villas and so on. TopHouzzing  also offers consulting & real estate, design & construction and other professional services in its portfolio.

Hard work and our passion paid off. Our success is clearly stated not only in the many owners that trust us with their properties but even more in the hundreds 5-star reviews from guests from all over the world,  leading us to have a record of 14 consecutive quarters-since the company’s inception- SuperHost status on nocarz!

We take very good care of our guests and so do we with owners. You see, we both think as guests & owners ourselves. We are waiting anxiously to host you or to manage your property, in both cases you are in good hands with us.

Boasting a bar and a terrace, Dunlin Hotel is set in Athens, 100 m from National Theatre of Greece and 300 m from Omonia Square. This 3-star hotel offers room service and a tour desk. The accommodation offers rooftop bar and a 24-hour front desk.
The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Dunlin Hotel all rooms have bed linen and towels.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Dunlin Hotel all rooms have bed linen and towels.

neighborhood_overview:
Kolonaki is a vivid area thanks to a well-balanced blend of Athenian connoisseurs who visit it for its vibrant city life and night scene. One of the city’s leading shopping areas, it boasts high-end boutiques, fine jewelry shops and contemporary art galleries. There are museums, art galleries and cultural venues to satisfy the needs and wants of enthusiastic travelers. Check out the Byzantine and Christian Museum, the Benaki Museum, the Archeological Musuem, the War Museum, the Museum of Cycladic Art and the EMST National Museum of Contemporary Art. Art enthusiasts will also adore the Greek National Gallery, the
Fine Arts & Music Foundation M&B Theocharaki and the Skoufa Art Gallery.

neighborhood_overview: Petralona is one of the oldest and most charming neighborhoods in Athens. It is located in the west of the historical city center right underneath Philopappou Hill where you can access this great ancient green area on the way to Acropolis, the National Observatory, the Odeon of Herodes Atticus and many more historical monuments within 15' walk. The area is acquiring a reputation as an artistic and traditional neighborhood following the opening of cool bars and traditional and modern cuisine.

name: Wake up with Acropolis view!
description:
Uber-centrally located in the heart of historical Athens, this 2022 utterly reconstructed studio is in the premises of an iconic office building from the 70’s, which was flipped into a serviced condo-building.

It provides its guests with direct access to all MUST visit attractions. Bars, restaurants, subway, bus and train stops, as well as all the major sightseeings are within 3 minutes walking distance.

Free constant WiFi ofcourse is included :)
neighborhood_overview:
Psyri, a hip neighborhood, used to have in its premises the majority of the leather traders and craftsmen till the mid 80s’. Now, it has repositioned itself into a vibrant area full of stylish bars, traditional cafes and restaurants.

While walking during the daytime you can meet a variety of people, from businessmen to men selling and bargaining used stuff on the street.

Acropolis, the Acropolis museum, Plaka, Monastiraki flea market, as well as Syntagma square and all the upbeat Athens neighborhoods are in the immediate vicinity.

Upon arrival, we provide you with tailor-made recommendations. Enjoy “Athens by night” while being minutes from home ;)
host_about:
Kalimera (=Good Morning)! I am Alexandros, an ex-financier who turned into an entrepreneur.

I grew up in Athens, Greece, an awesome and vibrant city, where I studied Civil Engineering at NTUA. I was always keen on music, a passion which I flipped into DJing, yeap!!! Following my graduation I wanted to see the world and study abroad, so I attended Columbia University in NYC for my second Masters degree. The 2008 crash sent me directly to Germany where I started my career in banking.

After some years in corporate environments I decided to follow my real love, which is creating things from scratch, so I quit my job and alongside with my brother, George, we began a hospitality start-up.

We provide unique furnished apartments by offering personalized services!

It is so awesome to be an explorer and we believe that if you do not travel is like reading only the cover of the book. Hence,  t-r-a-v-e-l  :)

We hope to enjoy your staying with us!!!!

Keep it real,
Alexandros.

neighborhood_overview:
Acropolis is one of the most picturesque neighborhoods in Athens. The long pedestrian street passes in front of the Acropolis, Herodeion Theater, the New Acropolis Museum and finally reaches the Hadrian Arch. It is also known as Makrigianni quarter in Athens, where the statue of Makrigiannis lies, the hero of the Greek Revolution, that is found at the beginning of this street, in a small round square. Its architectural beauty and its historical significance, make this quarter popular among tourists and a favorite spot of the Athenians to stroll around on a Sunday morning, under the Holy Rock. It borders with the picturesque neighborhood of Plaka from one side and the region of Koukaki on the other.

name: Stairway to Acropolis
description:
Cozy and modern penthouse in the heart of Athens, at the highest point of the center.

This apartment is located at the top of a 7th floor building in Exarchia, with a magnificent view of Athens, the sun, but mostly the view of acropolis.

National Archaeological Museum is located 2 min. away. In a small distance of 2.6km you will find acropolis and its museum.

Ιt's located by foot, 10 min. from Omonoia metro,2 min. from trolley and bus and 10 min. from KTEL bus that goes to beaches & Sounio.
neighborhood_overview:
Exarchia is one of the most important parts of Athens. It has been described as the center of exchanging ideas, art, creativity and free spirit. Most artist, poets, painters and actors have lived in these neoclassical houses, but also in the mondern days it's an artistic neighborhood, with the avant garde Athenian lifestyle.

You will find traditional cafes, restaurants with fusion cuisine & taverns with amazing Greek food, vintage shops with used vinyls, CDs and books, art galleries, boutiques, cozy bars, clubs and many more.

Within 2 minutes you will find the Archaeological museum of Athens, which displays the very famous Antikythera mechanism.

Also Attica KTEL buses are 4 minutes by foot, where you can have access to all the beaches of Attica, as well as Sounion.

In a distance of 2 minutes you will find Hope on, Hope Off Bus (route Athens, stop 11, National Archaeological Museum), where you can visit all important monuments in Athens (i
host_about: I love travelling, eating and making new experiences. I am from a multicultural family with English being our common language. I grew up in Athens but I feel a tourist in my own country, because we love exploring it! The guide that you will find in our apartment it’s our selection with our favourite places to go and eat. But please feel free to ask me at all times about anything!

description:
Calling all New Age Travellers and Families. If you are looking for a large & modern apartment in the heart of Athens - look no further!
The apartment is 3 minutes walk from Victoria Station that provides easy access to all touristic sites (7 minutes metro ride to Monastiraki - Acropolis) and direct connection to the Port of Piraeus. Supermarket, bakeries, bank, pharmacy and cafés/restaurants can be found all around on Victoria Square.
neighborhood_overview:
Unbeatable location with excellent transport connections from Victoria Station that is just a 5 minutes walk from the Apartment. From Victoria you can get to Monastiraki (famous square just below Acropolis) in 7 minutes with the Metro. Victoria has direct connection to the Port of Piraeus where all the Ferrys to the different islands start.

Supermarket, bakeries, bank, pharmacy and cafés/restaurants can be found all around on Victoria Square.

You can also visit the world famous Archaeological Museum of Athens that is 10 minutes away on foot.

neighborhood_overview:
Petralona is n authentic area, entrance of historical center of Athens at the foot of Filopappou Hill. A small & vintage neighbourhood with stone houses that have survived over the years preserving their uniqueness.
Today, Petralona neighborhood, has attracted many new habitants, artists and Athenian citizens who love the area for its atmosphere. Small old-fashioned coffee shops and snack bars have been born again with a new, fresh decorative look whilst offering a variety of entertainment even early in the day. Away from the noise of the city center, a tottaly hospitable and safe neighborhood.
host_about: Hi there! I'm Fotini. I live in the historical center of Athens, for the last 20 years. I love to travel, seeing new places, as to meet people from all over the world!

description: Within the true heart of Athens City on the border of Kolonaki and Syntagma, this stylish home is located on one of the city’s most prestigious and historic streets. Just steps from Kolonaki Square, guests can enjoy a wide array of entertainment options, from cafes and brunch spots to bars, clubs and fine dining. neighborhood_overview:
Located in the heart of Athens, the neighborhood around Valaoritou 9 is a vibrant blend of history, culture, and modern city life. This area is close to **Kolonaki**, one of Athens' most upscale and stylish districts, known for its high-end boutiques, art galleries, trendy cafes, and chic restaurants. Just a short walk away, **Syntagma Square** serves as the city's central hub, with quick access to landmarks like the **Hellenic Parliament**, the **National Garden**, and the iconic shopping streets of **Ermou** and **Voukourestiou**.

The neighborhood offers a mix of historical charm and modern convenience, surrounded by neoclassical buildings and cultural institutions like the **Benaki Museum** and the **Museum of Cycladic Art**. Whether you’re exploring ancient sites, dining at local tavernas, or browsing luxury stores, this area offers a lively and well-connected base to experience the best of Athens230 m. from Attica Shopping Mall


400 m. from Subway - Metr

Athens Tram is 3 mins away (Syngrou-Fix station). Ideal for families, couples or friends that prefer a quiet and relaxing stay near Acropolis.
